import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { Button, Modal, Container, Row, Col, Form, Table } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { DAYS, getDayName } from '../helpers' // Tu trzeba dorobić helpera żeby zwracał nazwy opcji w postaci I kwartał 2020, Styczeń 2020 itp. const BillingPeriod = (props) => { if ( props.period_type === "MONTH" ) { return (<> { ["2020-01", "2020-02", "2020-03", "2020-04", "2020-05", "2020-06", "2020-07", "2020-08", "2020-09", "2020-10", "2020-11", "2020-12" ].map(period => { return ( ) }) } ) } return (<> { ["2020-01", "2020-04", "2020-07", "2020-10","2021-01", "2021-04", "2021-07", "2021-10"].map(period => { return ( ) }) } ) } function Settings() { const [modalShow, setModalShow] = useState(false); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { billing_period, billing_period_type, daily_time, daily_break, weekly_break, free_days, shifts_crew } = useSelector( state => state.settings ); const holidays = useSelector( state => state.holidays ); return (<> setModalShow(false) } size="lg"> Panel CarrotHR Rodzaj okresu rozliczeniowy: dispatch({ type: 'BILLING_PERIOD_TYPE', value: e.target.value }) } custom> Okres rozliczeniowy: dispatch({ type: 'BILLING_PERIOD', value: e.target.value }) } custom> Maksymalny dzienny czas pracy: dispatch({ type: 'DAILY_TIME', value: e.target.value })}/> Minimalna przerwa między zmianami: dispatch({ type: 'DAILY_BREAK', value: e.target.value })}/> Minimalna tygodniowa przerwa: dispatch({ type: 'WEEKLY_BREAK', value: e.target.value }) }/>
Dni wolne: { DAYS.map(key => { return ( dispatch({ type: 'FREE_DAYS', key: key, value: e.target.checked }) } checked={ ( free_days[key] !== null ) ? true : false } custom /> ) }) } { Object.entries(free_days).map(([key, value]) => { if ( value !== null ) { return ( { getDayName( key ) } dispatch({ type: 'FREE_DAYS_INDEX', key: key, value: e.target.value }) }/> dispatch({ type: 'FREE_DAYS_PERMANENT', key: key, value: e.target.checked }) } checked={ value.permanent} custom /> ) } else { return false; } })}
Minimalna załoga pracownicza: { ["mon", "tue", "wed", "thu", "fri", "sat", "sun"].map(key => { if ( ( free_days[key] === null ) || ( free_days[key] !== null && free_days[key].permanent === false ) ) { return ( ) } else { return false; } }) }
Zmiana: I II III
{ getDayName( key ) } dispatch({ type: "SHIFTS_CREW", key: key, shift: "shift_1", value: e.target.value })} /> dispatch({ type: "SHIFTS_CREW", key: key, shift: "shift_2", value: e.target.value })} /> dispatch({ type: "SHIFTS_CREW", key: key, shift: "shift_3", value: e.target.value })} />
) } export default Settings;
